sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 951,852 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 473,832.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 10,241 for 15 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,979 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 184 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
